name: dating-app-fullstack
description: 婚恋交友网站全栈应用

scripts.build: cd server && npm run build || cd /opt/render/project/src/server && npm run build && cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev && npm run build || cd /opt/render/project/src/client && npm install && npm install --only=dev && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm run start || cd /opt/render/project/src/server && npm run start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-server: cd server && npm install || cd /opt/render/project/src/server && npm install
scripts.install-client: cd client && npm install || cd /opt/render/project/src/client && npm install
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-server && npm run install-client && cd client && npm run build || cd /opt/render/project/src/client && npm run build
